info.title: Simple API
info.description: A simple API to learn how to write OpenAPI Specification

LoginParameter.name: login
LoginParameter.description: email and password to login in database

SendResetPasswordLinkParameter.name: send_reset_password_link
SendResetPasswordLinkParameter.description: send reset password link to email

AddTeamParameter.name: add_team
AddTeamParameter.description: parameters or details to create/add a team

LevelHierarchyPathParameter.name: level_hierarchy
LevelHierarchyPathParameter.description: level hierarchy to identity particular level of peoples in that team

UpdateTeamParameter.name: update_team
UpdateTeamParameter.description: details that are to be updated of a team

AddCompanyParameter.name: add_team
AddCompanyParameter.description: parameters or details to create/add a company

UpdateCompanyParameter.name: update_company
UpdateCompanyParameter.description: details that are to be updated of a company

AssignUserRolesForGivenProjectBulkParame.name: AssignUserRolesForGivenProjectBulkParameter
AssignUserRolesForGivenProjectBulkParame.description: Assign user roles bulk for given project

AddProjectParameter.name: add_project
AddProjectParameter.description: parameters or details to create/add a project

UpdateProjectParameter.name: update_project
UpdateProjectParameter.description: details that are to be updated of a project

BadRequestForUpdateUserProfileResponse.description: bad request for update user profile

NotFoundForUpdateUserProfileResponse.description: bad request for update user profile

SendResetPasswordLinkBadRequestResponse.description: send reset password link bad request response

SendResetPasswordLinkNotFoundResponse.description: send reset password link not found response

GetUserProfileBadRequestResponse.description: get user profile bad request response

GetUserProfileNotFoundResponse.description: get user profile not found response

BadRequestForGetListOfTeamsResponse.description: given limit or offset is not valid

UnauthorizedRequestForGetListOfTeamsResp.description: user has no access to see teams

UnauthorizedForAddTeamResponse.description: User has no access to add a team

NotFoundForAddTeamResponse.description: Requested users not found to add

BadRequestForAddTeamResponse.description: Team name already exists or duplicate users has sent

BadRequestForUpdateTeamResponse.description: Team name already exists or duplicate users has sent

UnauthorizedForUpdateTeamResponse.description: User has no access to update team

NotFoundForUpdateTeamResponse.description: Invalid team or Invalid Users sent

SuccessForGetCompaniesResponse.description: returns all companies with their employee details

UnauthorizedForGetCompaniesResponse.description: user has no access to see companies

UnauthorizedForAddCompanyResponse.description: User has no access to add a company

NotFoundForAddCompanyResponse.description: Requested users not found to add

BadRequestForAddCompanyResponse.description: Company name already exists or duplicate users has sent

UnauthorizedForDeleteCompanyResponse.description: User has no access to delete a company

BadRequestForUpdateCompanyResponse.description: Company name already exists or duplicate users has sent

UnauthorizedForUpdateCompanyResponse.description: User has no access to update company

NotFoundForUpdateCompanyResponse.description: Invalid company or Invalid Users sent

UnauthorizedForDeleteTeamResponse.description: User has no access to delete a team

UserDoesNotFoundResponse.description: User Does Not Found Http Exception Response

SendEmailVerifyLinkBadRequestResponse.description: BadRequest for send email verify link

SendEmailVerifyLinkNotFoundResponse.description: Send email verify link not found response

GetTeamMemberLevelsSuccessResponse.description: Success response for get team member levels

GetTeamMembersOfLevelHierarchySuccessRes.description: Success response for get team members of level hierarchy

GetListOfUserRolesForGivenProjectSuccess.description: Get specific project details success response

AssignUserRolesForGivenProjectBulkBadReq.description: Add specific project details bad request response

get.description: Get configuration details for add and edit user

post.description: Login the use and return access token of user
Logout the user from all devices
Send user reset password link to email
Reset user password using token which we provided

get.description: Returns a list containing all teams related to a user(admin).
Returns all companies and related employee count, if accessed by admin

post.description: Get refresh auth tokens for given access token and refresh token

201.description: Successfully created the team member levels

get.description: Get levels for given team id in path

post.description: Add users to levels for given team id in path

get.summary: Get Team Members Of Level Hierarchy
get.description: Get team members in given level hierarchy

post.description: Add member to superiors to given team_id with level hierarchy

get.description: Returns all Projects if accessed by admin

get.summary: Get Team Members Levels With Members
get.description: Get all members of a team with level details

get.summary: Get List Of User Roles For Given Project
get.description: Get list of user roles for given project

post.summary: Assign User Roles For Given Project Bulk
post.description: Assign user roles for given project bulk

201.description: Successfully assign the user roles for given project bulk
